# Upgrade Plan

## Overview
This plan upgrades the Java project to the latest LTS (Long Term Support) versions: Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4.

## Target Versions
- **Java**: 21 (LTS)
- **Spring Boot**: 3.4 (LTS)
- **Spring Framework**: 6.x

## Tasks
See `tasks.json` for detailed task breakdown and execution order.

## Key Changes
- JDK upgrade to version 21
- Spring Boot upgrade to 3.4
- Spring Framework upgrade to 6.x
- Migration from `javax.*` to `jakarta.*` packages
- Update build configuration and dependencies
- Address breaking changes and deprecated APIs
